overview: Fly over Connecticut, Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island and Vermont in Over New England, and see red barns, white steeples, rugged coastlines, harbors and lighthouses. Includes brief narrative passages and an original soundtrack.
tagline: Celebrate New England's landscapes and landmarks from one of the most exhilarating vantage points possible”the air”and get rare views of Connecticut, Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island and Vermont in all their glory.
title: Over New England
